name: Downtime Traffic
description:
A simple and fun minimal puzzle game that will keep you occupied. Solve traffic puzzles by controlling the intersections. 

FEATURES

* 100% hand-crafted farm-to-table levels
* Timed Mode - direct cars to their destination
* Taxi Mode - pickup and deliver passengers, collect fare, endless play

HOW TO PLAY

* Drag the intersection arrows in the direction you want cars to go
* Tap the clock to speed up time
